Title: The Mast
Description:
The Mast is a new region in the form of a large transmission spire in the western area of the world. 
Now returning with a coat of new paint and a bunch of new content for Downpour!

[img]https://imgur.com/gnr41IC.png[/img]
[h2]This mod includes...[/h2]
[list]
[*]A new region that connects Sky Islands, Subterranean and the (currently in-development) modded region Badlands
[*]Over 400 new screens, spanning a diverse and detailed environment
[*]A full original soundtrack
[*] A number of custom gameplay features to discover, including [spoiler]a new critter![/spoiler]
[*]Unique creature spawns and world changes for all vanilla and MSC slugcats
[*]Spearmaster [spoiler]has access to an alternate ending location[/spoiler]
[*]Significant world changes for Saint
[*]3 custom arenas
[/list]
[h2]Recommended playthroughs[/h2]
[list]
[*]For a first playthrough, I recommend one of the three vanilla slugcats, but all slugcats have a unique world state!
[*]For those familiar with the mod, or returning players for Downpour, I recommend exploring the region as late-game Spearmaster, and/or early-game Saint.
[/list]

[img]https://imgur.com/nOb5UkQ.png[/img]
Many thanks to these wonderful people!
[list]
[*]Slime_Cubed and M4rbleL1ne - custom code features
[*]Fishnoid - promotional/thumbnail artwork
[*]Classick - custom region artwork
[*]The beta testers - Slime_Cubed, cadycat, Tronsx, Mehri'Kairothep, Vela, flanburgr, Myrmice, Tryn, mayhemmm, klumquart and Detrax
[*]Modhole and the Rain World modding community, for all the support and help with troubleshooting
[/list]
